displayName.english: A Hat Does Not Make a Mage

description.english: Equip a Warrior with a full set of items typically used by Mages
Collect at least one item for every equipment slot
Equip a single hero with 3 legendary items
Healer got distracted. Rider got deleted. Jungle hospitality at its finest.
Collect every possible pickup in a single match
Push an enemy into fire
Kill a hero using a Scout
Defeat an enemy under the effect of "Petrification" (multiplayer only)
Win a match with only one active unit left on the battlefield (multiplayer only)
Reach a state where every unit on the board suffers from hellish heat
Stealth, sabotage, sentiment… and sinus issues. It all falls apart in one tragic cough.
Survive a mission requiring 12 rounds without any unit dying
Finish the maze mission in under 18 rounds
Deal damage with pacifist Granger during the campaign mission
Recruit every available hero
A fully healed hero remains on a fort healing for 7 turns straight
Fight a 1v1 duel with the last enemy unit for 5 full turns

displayName.english: Not for Dogs.. For the Lords!

description.english: Pull an enemy hero off a fort and occupy it with your own unit
Lose a unit after using the laughing emote with it
They say foxes are cunning. Nobody said when it starts to kick in. (Win the first mission of the campaign)
She waited beneath crystal and time — you finally answered (Complete Mission 1_3)

displayName.english: See You on the Other Side

description.english: You saved the day — but not everyone lives to see tomorrow
Some friendships survive even empires falling

displayName.english: Finally Safe… But For How Long?

description.english: One turtle ride closer to vengeance
Patience is a virtue. Also, a combat strategy.
What doesn’t kill you might still make you giggle
Because shouting “calm down” doesn’t always work
Classic strategy: Burn it. Then stab what’s left
You arrived as wolf nobility. You left as compost. (Have Varian die during the first mission of the campaign)
Turns out even a brooding space wolf appreciates some manners
Fight ghosts of the past. Literally. With violence
You were the meal. Congrats on going plant-based by force
Big antlers. Big heart. Big responsibility
Turns out trauma makes a hell of a scrapbook
Plan your path while your foxes accidentally start a war.

displayName.english: This Is Why We Can’t Have Nice Things

description.english: Arrive in a new city, start a diplomatic incident, run for your lives.
Rescue turns to ruin when betrayal takes its final form.

displayName.english: When the Earth Cracks, the Sea Answers

description.english: Endure separation, face the drowned, and follow the path toward forgotten knowledge
Hage couldn’t. The rocks didn’t.
Let rage take over — and survive fire, monsters, mercenaries, and your own grief.
Hold the line on a flaming turtle until Hage crashes the party. In style.
